job.title: Entry Level Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout ArrcusltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtArrcus was founded to enrich human experiences by interconnecting people machines and data The Arrcus team consists of worldclass technologists who have an unparalleled record in shipping industryleading networking products complemented by industry thought leaders operating executives and Tier One VCsltbrgtltbrgtWe offer a variety of roles in software hardware and cloud environments We are looking for people who are selfmotivated creative and agile You will work closely with the topnotch talent in Arrcus in redefining networkingltbrgtltbrgtPrior work experience in a venture backed company is a big plusltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEducation And Skills RequiredltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMS in Computer EngineeringComputer Science or equivalent degree Graduation in 2021ltligtltligtAbility to write high quality C code along with automated test cases using PythonltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtExperience RequiredltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtStrong communication skills with the ability to articulate ideas in a precise mannerltligtltligtAbility to demonstrate deep understanding of algorithms data structures and other system factors that affect code quality and performanceltligtltligtSome experience building software beyond the school curriculum like an internship hackathon research project or related experience is preferredltligtltligtStrong time management skills and delivering software projects with teamsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtInvestors and FundingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtArrcus has raised 49M in funding from Lightspeed Venture Partners General Catalyst and Clear Ventures Its Board of Directors includes Guru Chahal Partner at Lightspeed Steve Herrod Managing Director at General Catalyst and Chris Rust Founder and General Partner at Clear VenturesltbrgtltbrgtFor more information go to wwwarrcuscom or follow arrcusinc
